data.name: X8 Sandbox Apk For Android

data.part2: As you know that most online games are also available on Facebook and people have limited life while playing games they need to wait for the 24-hour minimum if they lost all their lives while playing to play that game again.Players don’t want to wait for lives and want to complete all their tasks without losing lives in-game. If you are one of those Facebook game players, then you need to use this app that we are discussing here. It not only works on online games but also hacks offline games too.

data.name: Information about App
data.part1: After installing this app on your smartphone the whole interface of your smartphone is changing and you have the option to add all games and apps which you want to run in the x8 Sandbox app. After adding an app or game they start running in the background through this application.
data.part2: If you want to stop this app simply tap the on-off button on your mobile screen on the home page and your device will return to its old interface again. This app also allows you to use all rooted apps and games without rooting your device by adding them to this app.
